title: Does a low level all mid hack exist?
body:
Hi,

Something strange just happened in my low level normal game where all 5 enemy rushed mid level 1 and constantly kept doing that throughout most of the game. I was smurfing so I knew how to deal with the situation and we ended up winning.

 It was really strange because they kept blowing their ghost summoner spells randomly. None of them spoke in all chat because I would think at least one would complain about their team (as pretty much all of them were feeding).
It was just very unnatural game play as though they were bots and I'm wondering if there is some sort of hack people do to grind their low level accounts. 

One of my team members in the lobby said they've seen it done before; 

"jacklovesmint: so i have faced that before
AyoDub: lol
yoanlovesmint: same
jacklovesmint: and they never appear in the lobby after"

and they did not seem to appear in the lobby at all. I sent the enemy team all a friend request but none of them have accepted.

It's not a major problem, I'm just curious about the whole scenario.

replies.body:
Yup, it's likely that these players are botting their accounts. If you encounter players like these, you can report them for "cheating". Otherwise, if you notice players like these and don't have access to the post-game lobby/reports, you can submit a ticket. Here's some information on submitting a ticket with a report: 
______________

To report players who commit offenses outside of matches or who violate the Terms of Service but don't fall under one of the standard categories, you can send Riot a report by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to Riot Games Player Support with a screenshot of the said offenses and any additional information that you'd like to add. 

**If you're unsure which category to submit your ticket under, just select:**
[*I have a question about League of Legends/Riot Games.*] > [*Game and Features*] > [*General Questions*]

Thank you for your diligence.

OMG I am spectating one of the games of one of the members of the enemy team (by searching up lolnexus) and they're all doing it again! (they are the red team) but with different team members.

 It's REALLY strange because they are 'preparing for an invade' and when one of the enemy team (blue team) walks into the bush of the red team just auto attacks them a few times but does not chase the blue team member. It's very orderly, none of them pings, they all don't chase and when they all reach to the mid turret, they all press ghost.
They are constantly blowing their summoner spells randomly.

Riot did you program bots to come up in low level normal games randomly so that low levels can learn from their games?
If I figure out how to record this, I will send it to you but I have the names of all the players.
